http://www.CityTV.nl
http://www.t-dose.org/
Playlist T-Dose2010
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEiexKPrA5DTbOEr1i89ty8ax

Author: Andreas Rogge

Good system administrators are lazy! They try to get rid of every routine job by using automation and thus make these jobs less error prone. This talk shows some free automation tools.

More:
http://www.t-dose.org/2010/talks/puppet

Technical Dutch Open Source Event.
November 6, 2010
Fontys Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2010,  Be Lazy! - manage configuration with puppet, Andreas Rogge
